attributes.action: remove the title of "Right Honorable" or "Sir" from MPs who do not repay their expenses identified by Sir Thomas Legg
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The title of "Honourable", "Right Honourable" or "Sir" of MPs who do not repay their expenses identified by Sir Thomas Legg should be removed, as they are not acting honourably or in the interests of "The Realm" or taxpayer/voters.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
